mapper.select: select music_id, title, artist, date_format(created_at, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_at from Musics order by music_id asc
mapper.insert: insert into Musics(title, artist, release_date, lyrics, created_at) values (#{title}, #{artist}, #{releaseDate}, #{lyrics}, now())
mapper.select: select title, artist, release_date, lyrics, date_format(created_at, '%Y.%m.%d %H:%i:%s') as created_at from Musics where music_id = #{musicId}
